variantid.title: Variant ID
variantid.description: An external ID for the variant like dbSNP.
variantid.comment: This is currently only accepting rsIDs

items.title: The genes associated with this variant

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the chromosome, e.g. chr1 or chrX

ref.title: Reference Sequence
ref.description: The sequence found in this position in the reference.

alt.title: Variant Sequence
alt.description: The sequence found in this position in the variant.

items.title: The phenotype traits associated with this variant

dbxrefs.title: External Resources
dbxrefs.comment: This list should have at least an ID from the official nomenclature. The list of other dbxrefs is maintained using information from NCBI Entrez. Identifiers not included in NCBI gene_info can be added but are not actively maintained.

items.title: External identifier
items.description: A unique identifier from external resource (e.g. HGNC, MGI, FlyBase, WormBase, ENSEMBL, MIM, UniProtKB, Vega, miRBase).
items.comment: Submit as database_name:id. See changelog for potential databases.

variation_type.title: Variation Type
variation_type.description: The type of variant (SNV, duplication, insertion, duplication).

locations.title: Variant Locations
locations.description: Variant locations specified using 1-based, closed coordinates for different versions of reference genome assemblies.

items.title: Variant Location
items.description: Variant location specified using 1-based, closed coordinates for a specific version of the reference genome assembly.

assembly.title: Mapping Assembly
assembly.description: The genome assembly to which coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38.

position.title: Position
position.description: The starting coordinate of the variant.
